Tetris.name: Tetris
Tetris.description: When <c=action>launching</c> <c=midrow>midrow objects</c>, spend <c=status>TETRIS</c> for each already existing <c=midrow>object</c> to fit another one.

Jenga.name: Jenga
Jenga.description: When <c=action>launching</c> <c=midrow>midrow objects</c>, spend 1 <c=status>JENGA</c> to fit another <c=midrow>object</c> into a <c=midrow>stack</c>. <c=downside>It gets <c=wobbly</c></c>.

StackedLaunch.name: Stack
StackedLaunch.description: The launched <c=midrow>object</c> will be <c=midrow>stacked</c> with existing <c=midrow>objects</c>, if any.

Stacked.name: Stacked
Stacked.description: All <c=midrow>stacked</c> objects take turns in order. The last <c=midrow>stacked</c> object is the one that takes hits.

Wobbly.name: Wobbly
Wobbly.description: If any <c=midrow>objects</c> in the <c=midrow>stack</c> are destroyed, the whole <c=midrow>stack</c> also gets destroyed.

CardDrone.name: CARD DRONE
CardDrone.description: Beams a card at you once per turn.
